title: 4711: As an international user of the weather application, I want to change the temperature indicators to Fahrenheit, so that I am able to interpret the values more easily.
body:
## Conversation:
- Convert measured and perceived temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit
(Conversion formulas -> 째F = 째C * 1,8 + 32; 째C = (째F - 32) * 5/9)
- Integrate toggle switch for Celsius to Fahrenheit in top right corner of the temperature indicator screen
- Replaces values of temperature indicators for measured and perceived temperature with Fahrenheit and vice versa when toggle switch is pressed

## Confirmation:
- Verify correct conversion from Celsius to Fahrenheit and vice versa
- Check correct positioning of toggle switch in all common web browsers on both desktop and mobile devices
- Test correct temperature indication for measured and perceived temperature with multiple toggle switches
